Script.label: right_rotary_dec
Script.script: (L:wt_knob_selector, Number) 1 == if{ 1 (>K:KEY_MINUS, KeyEvent) } (L:wt_knob_selector, Number) 2 == if{ 1 (>K:KEY_MINUS, KeyEvent) } (L:wt_knob_selector, Number) 3 == if{ 1 (>K:HEADING_BUG_DEC) } (L:wt_knob_selector, Number) 5 == if{ 1 (>K:KEY_MINUS, KeyEvent) }

Script.label: right_rotary_inc
Script.script: (L:wt_knob_selector, Number) 1 == if{ 1 (>K:KEY_PLUS, KeyEvent) } (L:wt_knob_selector, Number) 2 == if{ 1 (>K:KEY_PLUS, KeyEvent) } (L:wt_knob_selector, Number) 3 == if{ 1 (>K:HEADING_BUG_INC) } (L:wt_knob_selector, Number) 5 == if{ 1 (>K:KEY_PLUS, KeyEvent) }
